name: surfboard
title: Surfboard
description: Save the tools you discover, tag them by when you'd need them, and recall them instantly
author: arvin_aradhana

commands.name: surfboard-save
commands.title: Surfboard Save
commands.subtitle: Save a tool to your team's toolkit
commands.description: Save a new tool or resource to your shared Surfboard

commands.name: surfboard-search
commands.title: Surfboard Search
commands.subtitle: Find a tool from your team's toolkit
commands.description: Search your team's shared Surfboard by keyword or tag

commands.name: surfboard-browse
commands.title: Surfboard Browse
commands.subtitle: Browse your toolkit by tag
commands.description: Browse all tools organized by intent tags

commands.name: surfboard-import
commands.title: Surfboard Import
commands.subtitle: Bulk import tools
commands.description: Import multiple URLs at once with shared tags

preferences.name: memberName
preferences.title: Your Name
preferences.description: How your team sees you in Surfboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
